title: Acts of Faith
description: When Emma's brother Paul dies in a car accident, everyone assumes it's just that - an accident. But then Linda, a friend of Paul's, tells Emma it was no accident and asks Emma to meet her. When Linda is brutally murdered and Emma is threatened, there's only one person Emma can turn to for help - her ex-husband, a cop who never wants to see her again. Sensuality Behind Closed Doors
author: Jessica Starre
